claim: in 2003 at the uefa intertoto cup the first and second round be tie in the first leg
resp:

1. Identify the competition where matches in 2003 took place by looking for rows containing the year 2003.
2. Narrow down to the Uefa Intertoto Cup matches by checking the competition column for rows with that title.
3. Check if there are any ties in the first leg by comparing the scores of the teams in the first round and second round of the cup on the same day (since they occurred at the same time).
4. If a team scored a goal and its opponent also scored an equal number of goals, it is considered a tie.
5. If any row has a 1-1 score for the first leg, that indicates a tie in the first leg.
